TopicTitle: How to do a Geostationary on Kerbin with Mechjeb

geosynch orbit is 2Ã¢â‚¬â€°868.75 km with a speed of 1Ã¢â‚¬â€°009.019 m/s - mj can get you there as you can do it manually: Raise your apoapsis to 2868,75km, caost to the apoapsis and circularize your orbit.
